desc: We sell home decor and Dixie Belle Paint products. We make most of our home decor from old and discarded items, such as windows, books, china and barn wood. Our creations are a perfect addition to your rustic and /or farmhouse decor. We use Dixie Belle Paint products for all of our creations and furniture makeovers.

layout.text: We offer a variety of wooden shapes to paint and paint your own canvas tutorials. Choose from To-go paint kits, host your own private paint party or attend one of our planned events held at a local venue.
